person_say: I'm wasting too much time on social media, and no one seems to understand how hard it is to avoid it. I need to take control and find a way to be more focused on my studies.
animal_say: There's a busy little bee named Bizy who specializes in time management! Want to meet her to buzz through your procrastination issues?

person_say: Meeting Bizy sounds nice, but I prefer to figure out my own way to tackle my procrastination issues.
animal_say: That's totally understandable! To tackle procrastination, try breaking your tasks into smaller chunks and set specific goals for each study session. You got this!
